name: 張素薰
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
 實驗研究
 量調查研究或質調查研究
 個案研究
 回溯研究
 文化比較研究
 理論闡述研究
schedule:
The Syllabus for 4E4 Senior Project, 2013(1)
Week	Topics
1	Introduction 
2	Introduction
3	Literature Review
4	Literature Review
5	Make further research if necessary
6	Literature Review
7	Data Collection 
8	Data Collection
9	Data Analysis
10	Data Analysis
11	Subject and Method
12	Data finding
13	Data finding
14	Conclusion
15	Conclusion
16	Presentation practice
17	Presentation Practice
18	Final Presentation

��

name: 陳雅玫
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
1. Week 1 ~ Week 4 Literature Review
2. Week 5 ~ Week 12 Data Analysis
3. Week 13 ~ Week 15 Introduction and Conclusion
4. Week 16 ~ Week 18 Final Revision and Presentation

name: 黃如瑩
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
Unit One: Using research resources
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Library Tour
Week 3 Database I
Week 4 Database II
Unit Two: Searching for target field
Week 5 Internet resources
Week 6 Choosing for desired fields
Week 7 Focusing on one field
Week 8 Locating several areas of interest
Unit Three: Choosing a topic
Week 9 Deciding on one area
Week 10 Exploring several possibile issues
Week 11 Narrowing down on two to three issues
Week 12 Doing research on these issues
Unit Four: Choosing a topic
Week 13 Focusing on one topic
Week 14 Discovering various aspects of the issues
Week 15 Doing research on these specific issues
Week 16 Choosing one issue that especially interests you
Wrapping up
Week 17 Research on this specific issue
Week 18 Presentation of the specific title for your thesis
scorePolicy:
1. Participation in group meeting: discussions and bi-weeking presentation 10% X 8 = 20%
2. Final project: research outcome and topicfor the thesis 20%
materials:
1. Writing Reearch Papers:  A Norton Guide. 4th Edition. By Melissa Walker. new York: Norton. 1997.
2. Handbooks on MLA and APA Writing Styles.

name: 蔡逸萍
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
 實驗研究
 量調查研究或質調查研究
 個案研究
 回溯研究
 文化比較研究
 理論闡述研究
schedule:
Week 1-4 Revision of literature review; data collection
Week 5-8 Writing up I (textual analysis)
Week 9-12 Writing up II (textual analysis)
Week 13-18 Revision
scorePolicy:
30% on Oral presentation
70% on Final research paper
